Title: Midea and Frigicoll Forge Strategic Alliance to Lead the HVAC Market in Spain and France
Summary: Midea Group and its long-term European partner Frigicoll jointly announced that they have officially reached a joint venture agreement in Spain and France to establish “Midea Frigicoll HVAC Spain” (formerly known as FRIGICOLL HVAC, S.L.U.) and “Midea HVAC France,” aiming to comprehensively expand their HVAC market presence in both countries.

Title: MBT Global Strategic Partner Conference 2025 | Rebuild the Future: Reshaping the Global Green Building Landscape
Summary: On July 2–3, the Midea Building Tech. Global Strategic Partner Conference 2025 was successfully held in Shanghai. Strategic partners from around the world gathered to explore the global development path and to exchange ideas on new collaborations integrating green, low-carbon, and intelligent building solutions.

Title: The 4th TRUE Conference Returns: Charting the Building Sector’s Digital  Low-Carbon Transition
Summary: As China advances toward its dual-carbon goals, the building industry is accelerating its shift toward existing building stock renewal. Integrating digitalization and low-carbon solutions has become critical for progress in this transformation. Against this backdrop, the 4th Midea Building Tech. TRUE Conference will take place in Shanghai on July 2-3, 2025.

Title: AI+Zero-carbon: The World’s First Fully AI-Powered Chiller Lighthouse Factory
Summary: On March 28, Midea Building Technologies (MBT) hosted the launch event for the world’s first full-process AI-empowered chiller lighthouse factory in Chongqing. With its exceptional intelligent manufacturing capabilities and green industrial practices, MBT Chongqing chiller factory has earned the prestigious lighthouse factory designation.
